channel.title: Where on your body would you have a valve?
channel.description:
Imagine, you get the opportunity to pose for a valve (the company) logo, and you get the question: "Where on any place on a body would you like to stick a valve in?" what in the world would you answer!?
Edit: personally I would chose in a great irony my icing... if it was visible through.

item.title: Where on your body would you have a valve?
item.dc:creator: Cheshyre_Parrot
item.description:
Either my navel, or my addam’s apple, those are better.

Nobody said “dick” yet ?

Black Mesa forums are becoming mature !!!

IKR. or ass. I’ve heard of several places near the ass but I don’t think there has been an actual statement of in the ass. I was rather confused. I didn’t know if I was on the internet any longer until I read your post.

item.title: Where on your body would you have a valve?
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
Slyr:

We already have two, why do wee need more? We have one that expels solid waste from our bodies in the the rear and one that expels liquid waste in the front.

ear canal wax, tearducts, nasal cavity mucus, salivary glands, sweat glands - - all are often excreted/excreting

But the good news is Valve’s valve doesn’t include a spigot.

Read full topic

item.title: Where on your body would you have a valve?

item.description:
johnyo:

Now you totally have to shop this pic. If you already haven’t, in which case, SHARE!

I’ll talk to a few friends this week while I’m in class. I’ll see if any would be interested in posing. This is not to satisfy your desire but a means to possibly have it [not likely] used by VALVe. I’ll update here with news on getting the model.
